1.title: The French Toast Connection
1.plot: Noah hits the San Diego County fair for breakfast with a bang with French Toast Bacon Bombs before trying carnival twists on classic dishes like deep-fried lobster mac and cheese at Indiana's La Porte County Fair.

1.title: 89er Days/Pungo Strawberry Festival
1.plot: Sampling the Giant Texas Tenderloin Sandwich in Oklahoma, as well as Strawberry Pizza in Virginia.

2.title: Viva! Vienna! Festival/Contraband Days Festival
2.plot: Creamy crab dip in Virginia; Louisiana's authentic crawfish gumbo.

3.title: Oak Mountain Spring State Fair/Apache Rattlesnake Festival
3.plot: Sampling fried bread pudding bites and fried rattlesnake.

4.title: Portland Rose Festival & Got to Be NC Fair
4.plot: The stranger side of Portland's fair food scene features Beef Tongue Tacos. Also: a Donut Sloppy Joe in North Carolina.

5.title: Meadowlands State Fair/Gardendale Magnolia Festival
5.plot: A look at New Jersey's freakiest state fair foods and a taste of Southern sweet potato pie ice cream.

6.title: California State Fair/North East Fair
6.plot: Carnival fare include a lobster corn dog and deep-fried peanut butter and banana sandwich.

7.title: Stanislaus County Fair/Texas Crab Fest
7.plot: The foods of the Stanislaus County Fair in Turlock, Cal., including homemade fries topped w/lobster claws and tail meat, donut ice cream sandwiches, and deep-fried frog legs. Also: coconut shrimp and grasshopper pie at the Texas Crab Fest.

8.title: K-Days/North Dakota State Fair
8.plot: S'mores mini-donuts and wild rice burgers in North Dakota.

9.title: Indiana State Fair/Old Canal Days
9.plot: Collosal Grilled Cheese in Indiana; Black and Blue Fries in Illinois.

10.title: Illinois State Fair/Erie County Fair
10.plot: Buffalo chicken pizza in New York; a horseshoe sandwich in Illinois.

11.title: Ohio State Fair/NC Potato Festival
11.plot: Pulled pork donuts and Calabash Flounder.

12.title: Canadian National Exhibition/PrairieFest
12.plot: Noah honors the Thanksgiving Waffle in Toronto, and visits the Korean Kimchi Dog in Illinois.

13.title: Miami-Dade County Fair/Sarasota County Agricultural Fair
13.plot: Chicken Wing Ice Cream; Glazed Donut Burgers; Red Velvet Funnel Cake.

14.title: Calgary Stampede
14.plot: In the season finale, Noah visits "Scorpion Pizza", during the "Calgary Stampede", to sample edible insects.

15.title: All American Eats
15.plot: A look at All-American food found at carnivals.

17.title: We Deep Fried That!
17.plot: Outrageous deep-fried treats are in the spotlight. Included: tacos; butter balls; mac and cheese; and watermelon.

18.title: Stick It to Me
18.plot: Noah explores the world of fork-free foods served on skewers. Among his discoveries are the Family Dog; Bacon Bomber; Gator Kabobs and Fudge Puppy.

19.title: Fully Loaded
19.plot: Noah puts the spotlight on foods, piled high with flavor. Included: BBQ baked potatoes; fries topped with lobster; a double-decker grilled cheese; and a towering dessert that combines an ice cream sundae with mini funnel cakes.

20.title: All You Can Meat
20.plot: Over-the-top meat experiences are highlighted by host Noah Cappe. Included: a tri-tip beef sandwich in Portland; and chicken wing ice cream.

1.title: From Livestock to Lemons
1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere, the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo in Texas is toured by host Noah Cappe, who gets a lesson in meat from the Lone Star State, plus eats a chili burger, barbecue baked potato, tamales and strawberry-waffle bombs. Later, breakfast pizza, a sushi tumito and funnel-cake dog are among the tasty highlights of Lemonade Days in Dunwoody, Georgia.

2.title: From Renaissance to Rio Grande
2.plot: A renaissance fair features conch fritters, deep-fried brownie bites with peanut butter and jelly, a fried green tomato BLT, and cookies-and-cream sandwich. Also: a cheesesteak, fries and huge taco await Noah in Mercedes, Texas.

3.title: From Derby Day to Down State
3.plot: Noah attends the Kentucky Derby Festival in Louisville, where he eats a custom-made pizza, Ozark-style loaded fries topped with pork, baked beans and cheddar cheese, fried cookie dough and a festive funnel cake.

4.title: From Small Town to Farmville
4.plot: Volunteers prepare food from around the world at the "Nederland Heritage Festival" in Texas; and host Noah Cappe discovers Southern comfort food being served at the "Dogwood Festival" in Farmville, N.C.

5.title: From Crawfish to California
5.plot: Host Noah Cappe finds seafood and sweets at the Louisiana Crawfish Festival. Later, he travels to Porterville, California, where he tastes a savory funnel cake, deep-friend pizza and an inside-out pineapple upside-down cake on a stick.

6.title: From Chowchilla-Madera to Ciao!
6.plot: Noah travels to Chowchilla, California, and discovers a meat extravaganza that takes three days to prepare, a funnel cake cheeseburger and the Baja avocado taco. Later, a trip to New Jersey for the St. Michael's Italian Festival includes Zeppole.

7.title: From Strawberry to Silver Dollar
7.plot: Noah visits the "Brandywine Strawberry Festival" in Pennsylvania, where he goes wild over a crab cake/roast beef combo; and he tastes a cheese pretzel, that's spicy and sweet, at the "Silver Dollar Fair" in Chico, Cal.

8.title: From Golden State to Gizzards
8.plot: Noah chows down on trend-setting fair food at the Sacramento County Fair in California's state capitol, where he treats himself to a jalapeño cheese skirt burger and cowboy campfire churros. Also: he eats a to-die-for donut and a giant onion dog.

9.title: From Michigan to Maize
9.plot: Noah attends the Start of Summer Celebration in Rockford, Michigan, and discovers a soulful sandwich, to-die-for casserole, and salted caramel-apple gelato. Also: he tries creations with names like the Hillbilly Hamburger and Bacon Screamer.

10.title: From Cornfields to Canada
10.plot: Noah travels to Fertile, Minnesota, where he eats a "dynamite dog", a sandwich piled high with prime rib and a fusion between barbecue and nachos. Also: he finds quintessential Canadian cuisine, with a carnival twist, at the Red River Exhibition.

11.title: From Heatwave to Heartland
11.plot: The Alameda County Fair in Pleasanton, California, finds Noah chowing down on caliente curls, a chile relleno dog, and a burger topped with bacon and mac and cheese. Also: a pastor in Iowa shares the recipe for his heavenly bean dish.

12.title: From West Coast to Wisconsin
12.plot: Breakfast on a stick and a new twist on the "green goddess" are found at the "Sonoma Marin Fair" in California. Also: Noah chows down, in Wisconsin, on the Racine County Fair's classic cheese curds and pink taco.

13.title: From Rock and Roll to Red River
13.plot: Noah has rave reviews for the "Sound of Music Festival" in Burlington, Ont.; and tries Minneapple pie and jalapeño wontons at the "Red River Valley Fair" in North Dakota.

14.title: From Fertile Fields to the Red River Valley
14.plot: Noah Cappe kicks things off in Polk County, Minnesota, where he goes local with the North Woods Sandwich Barbe chos. Then, he feels right at home ordering the Redneck Taco at the Red River Valley Fair.

1.title: Royals and the Red River City
1.plot: Noah Cappe begins Season 3 at the "Royal Winter Fair" in Toronto, where he gives the massive marshmallow crunch a try; and later, he explores the specialties at the "State Fair of Louisiana", including gorditas, nachos and a 5-lb burger.

2.title: Lights & Literature
2.plot: Noah gets turned onto two fusion favorites, the torthal and hoagie dog, at Magical Winter Lights in Houston, where he also tries his hand at making a deep-fried root beer float and torches a berry brulee waffle. Later, he dons some Victorian finery for "Dickens on the Strand" in Galveston, Texas.

3.title: Freak Show of Funnel Cakes
3.plot: Funnel cakes, that are crazy and delicious, are highlighted by host Noah Cappe, who tries the deep-fried treat with maple and bacon in Georgia, as a sundae in Ohio, a pumpkin variety in Kentucky, with apples in Pennsylvania, and topped with nacho cheese and jalapenos in California.

4.title: Burgers & Bombs
4.plot: The South Florida Fair in West Palm Beach features some wacky takes on fairground classics, including the waffle burger and donut Philly cheesesteak. Later, host Noah Cappe travels to the National Western Stock Show and Rodeo in Denver, where he tastes the uber-tater and icy apple dream.

5.title: Say Cheese!
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Cowboys & Cakes
6.plot: A cowboy burrito; Juicy Lucy; and funnel cake/cereal combo are among the tasty treats found at the Fort Worth Stock Show and Rodeo in Texas. Later, host Noah Cappe takes on a triple-decker sweet and bacon burger bomb at the Florida State Fair in Tampa.

7.title: Mac and Cheese and Monster Meat
7.plot: Host Noah Cappe chows down on Buffalo chicken mac and cheese and a crispy clamwich at the Great New York State Fair, where he also experiences PB&J ice cream and "The Defibrillator". Also: at the South Carolina State Fair, Noah eats a monster meatball and a corn dog fit for a king.

8.title: Bowls and Rolls
8.plot: Highlights of the Norfolk County Fair in Ontario include the Thanksgiving bowl, butter-bacon poutine, the cheeseburger egg roll, and ale-and-apple fritters. Later, the Columbia County Fair in South Carolina offers Noah the chance to eat gator nuggets with swamp sauce, hog on a log, and angel-and-devil dogs.

9.title: Dumplings and Pumpkins
9.plot: Host Noah Cappe has a laming yearning for tacos at the North Florida Fair in Tallahassee, Florida, where he also sinks his teeth into bacon, a Philly cheesesteak, and oxtail. Later, the Erin Fall Fair in Ontario is memorable for apple dumplings and pork belly sliders.

10.title: Shepherd's Pie and Sunday Dinner Sundaes
10.plot: Host Noah Cappe has a deconstructed turducken sandwich and country fried shepherd's pie at the Big E in West Springfield, Massachusetts; and also indulges in dessert, including deep-fried fruit punch and the Big E-clair. Later, meat is on the menu during every course at the Gwinnett County Fair in Georgia, where Noah chows down on a Sunday dinner sundae and funnel-fried bacon.

11.title: Clams and Cannoli
11.plot: Host Noah Cappe visits the Delaware County Fair in Walton, New York, where he goes wild for a unique twist on spaghetti and pizza, French fries with pork, clams and corn, and cannoli. Later, at the North Georgia Fair in Marietta, the day begins with a salmon breakfast biscuit and ends with an irresistible banana split.

12.title: Hot Doggin'
12.plot: Highlighting the best hot dogs, from the festivals and fairs visited by host Noah Cappe. Toppings include crab dip in Maryland; chile relleno in California; and whipped cream and chocolate.

13.title: Meat and Mandarins
13.plot: Interesting eats at the Eastern Carolina Agricultural Fair in Florence, South Carolina, includes the "catzagna"; deep-fried Philly blossom; a smokin' okra burger; and deep-friend banana pudding. Later, the Mountain Mandarin Festival in Auburn, California, offers visitors atomic habanero tots; cheesecake pizza and something called "The Big Yum".

14.title: Everything's Better with Bacon
14.plot: Host Noah Cappe sets out to prove that everything is better with bacon, as he travels to festivals and fairs across the country, in search of the biggest, baddest and best bacon dishes around.

15.title: Funnel Cakes and Fried Fudge
15.plot: The York Fair in Pennsylvania, which dates back to 1765, offers dishes that include a taste of Christmas, a pretzel stuffed with a burger, fork-free chick waffle and apple pie funnel cake. Also: the Steuben County Fair in Upstate New York features its own version of a Cuban sandwich, five-alarm fried fudge, and the rainbow sugar waffle.

16.title: Feast and Fries
16.plot: The Paris Fair in Ontario finds host Noah Cappe dining on a dish called "Her Majesty's Feast", as well as eating meat-pie pouline, a dirtbunger, and a gigantic wrap. Also: the Washington County Fair in New York offers unique twists on cotton candy, fries and s'mores.

17.title: Hogs and Dogs
17.plot: The Great Frederick Fair in Maryland offers host Noah Cappe the chance to try dishes named the Whole Hog, Crappy Dog, Cake a Dilla, and Hula Boat. Later, at New York's Wyoming County Fair, the specialties include a Monster Veggie Wrap, Mexita, and Exploding Fireball Taffy/

18.title: Ice Cream Dreams
18.plot: Homemade donuts and bacon wafers are paired with ice cream.

19.title: Fusion Fiesta
19.plot: Host Noah Cappe shines the spotlight on fusion foods that he finds at fairs in the Season 3 finale.

1.title: Some Like It Popped
1.plot: In the season 4 premiere, tearing into the Conevore, filled to the brim with smoked brisket, pork and chicken; eating the Ragin' Cajun hoagie before sampling a fried fruit tart and Big Banana Pop; the World Series Burger; chile relleno burritos; birthday cake popcorn balls.

2.title: When Harry Met Salad
2.plot: Taking a stroll with the Walking BBQ; bacon PB&J quesadilla; deep fried salad; an All-American ice cream sundae called the Burst of Freedom; the Lane County Fair in Eugene, Oregon.

3.title: Dawn of the Bread
3.plot: A traditional Indian fry bread, stuffed with some non-traditional ingredients; trying the Great Pacific Pita and the Deep Fried Chili Dog; eating the Marionberry Volcano; visiting the El Dorado County Fair in Placerville, California.

4.title: Meat, Pray, Love
4.plot: Noah visits the Delaware State Fair and tries the Delaware Dog, the funnel cake-filled Frankenfunnel Burger and the octopus-loaded Octotaco, along with the Killer Cereal Treat; Noah's second stop is the Obion County Fair in Union City, Tennessee.

5.title: Zacho Libre
5.plot: Noah heads to the Eaton County Fair, where he samples the PB Battered Burger, then tries Pina Colada Shrimp Tacos, fried zucchini Z'achos and a Super Fried Strawberry Shortcake; Noah visits the Montgomery County Fair in Gaithersburg, Maryland.

6.title: Jurassic Pork
6.plot: Noah visits the Wilson County Fair in Lebanon, Tennessee and tries Tennessee Chicken and taste Meme's Meatloaf Sammy; Noah enjoys the Three Little Pigs Melt and tries Buffalo Chicken Stromboli at the Pickaway County Fair in Circleville, Ohio.

7.title: A Guac to Remember
7.plot: Noah visits the Pacific National Exhibition in Vancouver, British Columbia, and gorges on the Big Pickle Dog, then samples the Colonel Katsu Bao, before trying the Deep Fried Margarita for dessert; Noah visits the LA County Fair in Pomona, California.

8.title: Cheesy Rider
8.plot: Noah visits the Prince William County Fair in Manassas, Virginia, and tries the Monumental Grilled Cheese and the Chesapeake Bay Poutine; at the Western Fair in London, Ontario, he dives into a Poutine Dog, the Bacaroni Bowl and Cherry Cheesecake Tempura.

9.title: Get Him to the Greek Pizza
9.plot: Euro-fusion Greek pizza; Crabby Patty burgers; deep-fried chili dogs; Fluffernutter elephant ear pastry; beer-battered burger; Mississippi mud fry.

10.title: The Rainbow Confection
10.plot: Jackfruit torta; peanut butter meatballs; cherry candy-coated hot wings; Ice Cream Garden; pulled pork rainbow melt.

11.title: Piefidelity
11.plot: Delaware State Fair; shrimp dog; "Crabtastic po'boy"; Apple Scrabble burger; deep-fried key lime pie.

12.title: The Good, the Bacon, the Ugly
12.plot: Texas State Fair in Dallas; bacon-tilla; chicken-fried lobster; carrot cake roly; deep-fried sweet potato pie; Oakland County Fair in Davisburg, Michigan.

13.title: 50 Shades of Crepe
13.plot: Noah heads to Vancouver, British Columbia to sample Canadian Poutine Stuffed Burger, Jerk Chicken Dumplings, and the Donuccino; Noah visits Fryeburg Fair in Maine, where he tries the Pig Pile in Paradise and eats local favorites, like a Lobster Roll.

14.title: Burger Bonanza
14.plot: Noah explores the huge variety of options carnival cooks have come up with to honor America's much loved sandwich; from classic beef burgers to exotic meats to buns made from pretzels and even donuts.

16.title: Breakfast of Champions
16.plot: Noah digs into morning meals with something for everyone, from the sinfully sweet cinnamon waffles to the hearty and delicious breakfast poutine.

17.title: Berry Delicious
17.plot: Noah samples seven berry sweet dishes; he discovers that berries are good on everything, from savory Strawberry Arugula Pizza to the perfectly named Strawberry Waffle Bomb.

18.title: Get Stuffed
18.plot: Noah stuffs himself with stuffed food; from spicy Southern stuffed peppers to a sweet cherry-stuffed dessert, Noah indulges in some of the best stuffed sensations North America has to offer.

-1.title: Episode dated 13 July 2017
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Carnival Eats
plot: Hi travels around The US And Canada going to carnivals and fairs, where he samples all kinds of carnival food.::Renee White
